name: Concrete Club
description: This app is for civil engineers and architects across India, to help you achieve more in your professional field.  The Inspiration Zone kindles your imagination through showcasing excellence in construction projects across the world.   The discussion forum allows you to raise difficulties and hurdles you may be facing in your sites, get answers from experts.   You now do not need to create your own website. Use Concrete Club to create your own beautifully curated portfolio and share across social media (such as facebook, whatsapp and email). Send your portfolio to potential clients and peers to showcase what you can do for them.  Use the ACC section to learn more about our products; contact us; give us your feed-back on the app, our products or our technical assistance, call for technical assistance on cement and concrete related concerns.  Actively refer sites and ACC products and win exciting gifts from the rewards section.
